title: Multiplying the Numerator and Denominator
text: We can multiply the numerator and denominators to get $$\frac{\left(2x-6\right) \left(x^2-25\right)}{\left(x^2-8x+15\right) \left(2x+10\right)}$$

title: Simplifying if Necessary
text: This fraction can be simplified through factoring. (2x-6)(x**2-25)/((x**2-8x+15)(2x+10))=2(x-3)(x+5)(x-5)/(2(x-5)(x-3)(x+5)=1/1=1
